position.description: Popup position with optional value of top bottom right left center
position.description_zh: Popup position with optional value of top bottom right left center

default-style.description: Whether to enable the default style
default-style.description_zh: Whether to enable the default style

lock-scroll.description: Whether to disable scrolling penetration, scrolling the Popup when disabled will not cause the body to scroll
lock-scroll.description_zh: Whether to disable scrolling penetration, scrolling the Popup when disabled will not cause the body to scroll

close-on-click-overlay.description: Whether to click the overlay to close the Popup
close-on-click-overlay.description_zh: Whether to click the overlay to close the Popup

close-on-key-escape.description: Whether to support keyboard ESC to close the popup
close-on-key-escape.description_zh: Whether to support keyboard ESC to close the popup

teleport.description: The location of the Popup to mount
teleport.description_zh: The location of the Popup to mount

safe-area.description: Whether to enable bottom safety zone adaptation
safe-area.description_zh: Whether to enable bottom safety zone adaptation

safe-area-top.description: Whether to enable top safety zone adaptation
safe-area-top.description_zh: Whether to enable top safety zone adaptation

events.name: open
events.description: Triggered when the Popup is open
events.description_zh: Triggered when the Popup is open

events.name: opened
events.description: Triggered when the Popup open-animation ends
events.description_zh: Triggered when the Popup open-animation ends

events.name: close
events.description: Triggered when the Popup is close
events.description_zh: Triggered when the Popup is close

events.name: closed
events.description: Triggered when the Popup close-animation ends
events.description_zh: Triggered when the Popup close-animation ends

events.name: click-overlay
events.description: Triggered when you click on overlay
events.description_zh: Triggered when you click on overlay
